examples.example: 我买了一辆崭新的自行车，准备开启健康的骑行之旅。

translate.english: I bought a brand new bicycle and am ready to start a healthy cycling journey.

examples.example: 我看见一辆漂亮的汽车从眼前驶过。

translate.english: I saw a beautiful car passing by in front of my eyes.

examples.example: 我在路边看到一辆酷炫的摩托车飞驰而过。

translate.english: I saw a cool motorcycle speeding by on the roadside.
